marquee.h1: Click on COVID-19 banner for information regarding Distance Learning and our Grab n Go food service. Grab n Go meals can be picked up in front of the elementary school Monday - Friday from 10:00 am - 1: 00 pm.

div.div: Cannon Falls Public Schools, partnering with families and community, will provide a safe, nurturing, challenging and inspiring environment to educate ALL individuals to be lifelong learners and responsible, productive citizens.
